items.name: Issam
items.text: I'm currently learning Spanish with Milli, and it's been a fantastic experience. Her teaching style is engaging, patient and adapted to individual needs. She makes learning fun and easy to understand. I highly recommend her!

items.name: Katarzyna
items.text: Natan conducts lessons excellently — everything calmly, without stress. He always answers all questions and explains well. He speaks Polish very well, which makes learning easier. You can tell he likes what he does! I recommend him!

items.name: Johan
items.text: Mili is a 10/10 Spanish teacher. Super sweet and makes learning fun. Always smiling and helping me learn, even when I forget to do homework!

items.name: Miriam
items.text: Natan is always very well prepared for classes. The lessons are interesting and motivating to speak.

items.name: Kamila
items.text: Mili conducts lessons professionally. She's always prepared and conveys her knowledge in an interesting, cheerful and simple way. Children love classes with Mili. We all see progress in their learning. We highly recommend learning Spanish with Mili :)

items.name: Nicolas
items.text: I only had 2 lessons and I can say that Nathan is fantastically energetic. Even a blind person can notice that he loves what he does and therefore the lessons are always fun, efficient and well done. I definitely recommend him.

items.name: Lance
items.text: After a few years of taking Spanish classes, I finally decided to get a private tutor. Mili's classes are interesting and her teaching style has been very helpful. In just a few weeks of meeting with her, I've learned more in a one-on-one environment than in a classroom.

items.name: Mateusz
items.text: Natan is an incredibly patient teacher. He has an excellent approach to the student. The lessons are conducted 100% in a very interesting way. If you're looking for a tutor with passion for language teaching, I really RECOMMEND him!

items.name: Matt
items.text: I've been learning with Mili for the past 4 months and she's great. She adapts to what you need to improve lesson by lesson, plus she brings a lot of enthusiasm and energy that helps a lot!

items.name: Jared
items.text: Natan is a really cool and friendly tutor! His lessons are amazing and always tailored exactly to what I'm looking to practice, and the discussion topics are varied and engaging. I feel more confident in my Spanish already, definitely hire him as your tutor!

items.name: Paul
items.text: Mili is a diamond in the huge haystack of Preply tutors. She clearly has a passion for teaching languages and enjoys it. She's very perceptive about your needs as a language learner and will help you progress faster than you think you're capable of. Ultimately, her very personal and student-centered teaching style makes learning fun. You'll always look forward to her classes!

items.name: D'arcy
items.text: Many thanks Natan for your help so far with my Spanish lessons! In just 3 lessons I already feel more confident speaking Spanish, which was my main concern when I started my lessons with Natan. I'm looking forward to learning more in the future. Thanks again for your support so far! I really appreciate Natan's easy lessons and patience.

items.name: André
items.text: I love learning with Mili. She's such a fun and nice person, and a professional teacher. She knows how to practice the language.

items.name: Imogen
items.text: Learning Spanish with Natan has been one of the best decisions I've made. He's patient, creative and makes every class fun and relevant. My confidence speaking Spanish has improved tremendously!

items.name: Ivana
items.text: Mili is a teacher with a lot of experience and patience. The lessons are very varied and she adapts very well to the student's needs. I have a lot of fun in classes and thanks to Mili I'm improving my Spanish knowledge in both informal and formal settings. I highly recommend classes with her!

items.name: Lennart
items.text: The classes are dynamic and adapted to my interests. Natan has a great ability to explain difficult concepts clearly. Now I can maintain conversations with Spanish speakers without problem.

items.name: Emna
items.text: Mili is the best Spanish tutor! She's incredibly patient, always takes time to explain everything clearly and makes learning very enjoyable. Her lessons are super organized, engaging and tailored to my needs. I've improved so much thanks to her guidance and support. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for a kind, dedicated and professional tutor!

items.name: Giulia
items.text: Thanks to his teaching method so human and motivating, I learned more in a few months than in years of school. I recommend his classes 100%.

items.name: Victoria
items.text: Very kind, patient and engaging for my 5-year-old daughter. The lessons make learning fun, and my daughter is excited to talk to Mili every week.

items.name: Declan
items.text: Incredible teacher! He has a gift for connecting with students and creating a relaxed but productive environment. I've learned not only the language, but also Hispanic culture.

items.name: Mario
items.text: Mili's lessons are individual and very well structured. I really enjoy the mix of conversation, grammar, reading, new vocabulary and cultural information. Great teacher, always smiling, highly recommended!

items.name: Lin
items.text: Before I was afraid to speak Spanish. Now I feel confident and excited to practice. Natan is very encouraging, kind and professional.

items.name: Yoshiro
items.text: Although she's quite young, she has a talent for teaching: she has the gift to teach.

items.name: Thiago
items.text: What I like most is how he adapts each class to what I need. Also, his cultural knowledge is impressive. I'm happy to have chosen him as my teacher!

items.name: Chadi
items.text: Mili is the best tutor you can have; kind, passionate and understanding; if you want to learn Spanish, she supports her students and creates a positive learning environment. She's the best.

items.name: Dalia
items.text: The classes are very interactive, and I always leave learning something new and useful. It's evident that he loves teaching and that's transmitted in every session.

items.name: Ellie
items.text: Milli is a great tutor; she prepares presentations and additional exercises you can do on your own so you can study more than the hour you pay for. She's super enthusiastic and kind; I highly recommend her.

items.name: Émile
items.text: His way of teaching is clear, structured and very fun. He helped me a lot with my pronunciation and grammar. Merci beaucoup!

items.name: Gurshant
items.text: Mili is very kind and always encourages me during lessons. She's very flexible with her style, and I recommend her for anyone who wants to start learning Spanish!

items.name: Aiko
items.text: I never imagined that learning Spanish would be so entertaining. I love how Natan incorporates games, music and culture in his classes.

items.name: Freja
items.text: A spectacular teacher! Very professional, kind and always punctual. Thanks to his classes, now I can speak with my friends in Spain without problem.
